# 零极限：创造健康、平静与财富的夏威夷疗法

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/lingjixian-x3
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/lingjixian-x3
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install lingjixian-x3
lingjixian-x3 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g lingjixian-x3
lingjixian-x3 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
